extendedInfo.description: Application allows you control mobile phone via SMS commands, receive information about incoming and outgoing sms and calls and perform many other actions.Key features that can be implemented via SMS-commands:- keep records of all outgoing and incoming SMS-messages, similar to tracking phone calls. You can quietly collect a database of all messages (including content of messages) even if messages are removed by someone;- lock the phone and turn on a loud warning signal. During the blocking the screen will always appear the same form, to hide which would need to be password;- forward SMS-messages (re-sending to specified number). You can forward all incoming messages to a specific number phone. In this case, all incoming messages can be hidden, ie, they will not be stored on your phone on which the application is installed;- obtaining the approximate location of the phone;- obtain IMEI of the mobile phone;- get list of missed calls (with phone number and name of the caller);- get list of unread SMS (indicating a telephone number and name of the sender);- know the name of a contact from the phonebook to the phone number you requested;- obtaining contact details of the phone book on his behalf. You can get telephone and E-mail addressed;- change ring volume.Full version contains:- no launch icon in menu;- lock phone;- receive list of all incoming, outgoing and missed calls in the last n hours;- get a list of (name and number) of all incoming and outgoing SMS message over the last n hours;- keep records of all outgoing and incoming calls. All data will be stored in memory of the phone and are hidden. So you can quietly collect a database of all calls, even if the call history is cleared by someone;- send a SMS to a specific numbers when unknown SIM-cars is inserted. This is useful, for example, when your phone is in someone else\'s hands (the thief or robber - they usually use their own SIM-card) and you need to know telephone number;- know the name of a contact from the phonebook to the phone number you requested;- obtaining contact details of the phone book on his behalf. You can get telephone and E-mail addressed;- change ring volume.
